source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Horns of the Destroyer

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

spell.description:
Use: Shift into a slightly different dimension, making it difficult for enemies to detect you.

... Unless it backfires.

Cannot be used in combat. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Rippers of the Destroyer

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,490, up to 12,453.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.6 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,546 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 198 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Transmogrified to:
Cape of the Destroyer

spells.description: Use: Zap yourself for 292,907 Nature damage, gaining 19,122 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
